title: Marcus Freeman Begins His First Full Season as Notre Dame’s Coach
description: Freeman’s first full season as a head coach will unfold in one of the most high-profile institutions in American sports. First up: No. 2 Ohio State, Freeman’s alma mater.
dc:creator: Alan Blinder
media:credit: Robin Alam/Icon Sportswire, via Getty Images
media:description: In an interview last month with The New York Times, Marcus Freeman talked about his approach in South Bend.
